decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s):
02 Rev C (General Arrangement Drawings); Location Plan
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development hereby approved shall be as per those described in the submitted application form and plans listed in Condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
| No part of the flat roofs of the proposed dwellinghouse shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A ,7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policies D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021).

| Prior to first occupation of the extension hereby approved, the existing dropped kerb along the site frontage to Beresford Road shall be removed and the kerb re-instated and maintained thereafter at the expense of the applicant.

Reason: In the interests the efficient operation of transportation and highway network in accordance with policies T6 and T6.1 of The London Plan (2021), Policies 6.13 Parking of the Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013).
description: The construction of a two storey side extension and a single storey rear extension.
